  • java.lang.Object

    public class PatternFillStyle
extends java.lang.Object
implements FillStyle
    A fill style using an image as a pattern.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PatternFillStyle

        public PatternFillStyle(com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Image image)
        Parametrized Ctor for pattern fills. Beware: underlying library does not allow the use of inlining of image data. Always use pictures constructed from straight URLs!
        Parameters:
        image - The image to use as a pattern.

      • PatternFillStyle

        public PatternFillStyle(com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Image image,
                RepetitionType repetition)
        Parametrized Ctor for pattern fills. Beware: underlying library does not allow the use of inlining of image data. Always use pictures constructed from straight URLs!
        Parameters:
        image - The image to use as a pattern.
        repetition - Defines how the image should be repeated

      • PatternFillStyle

        public PatternFillStyle(com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Image image,
                RepetitionType repetition,
                Vector2d offset)
        Parametrized Ctor for pattern fills. Beware: underlying library does not allow the use of inlining of image data. Always use pictures constructed from straight URLs!
        Parameters:
        image - The image to use as a pattern.
        repetition - Defines how the image should be repeated
        offset - Offset of the image in relation to encapsulating shape
